title: New Pikmin Game, N64 Switch Online Leak - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.27.22
description:
Blessing and Tim tackle a hefty news day with a new Pikmin game launching, Blizzcon canceled, N64 games for Switch leaked, and much more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:26 - Housekeeping
We are partnering with NVIDIA GeForce to have Andy play through Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy for the first time showing off all of that DLSS and Ray-Tracing goodness on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames after this show Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday
ALSO our Guardians of The Galaxy Review is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast. That’s featuring me, Tim, Snowbike Mike, and the momentary return of Greg Miller. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Our Spider-Man 2 In Review Rewatch is up right now featuring me and Anthony Carboni along with Tim, Nick, and Andy talking all about the 2nd movie of the Sam Raimi trilogy. And it’s as ridiculous as you expect it to be. That’s up right now on youtube.com/kindafunny and on podcast services.
A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is up right now and it is Janet and mine’s predictions, hopes, and dreams for this week’s PlayStation State of Play. You have approximately 24 hours to watch that episode before it’s out of date so JUMP ON THAT or you can listen to it after and make fun of us for how wrong we are or applaud us for how right we are.
Speaking of youtube.com/kindafunnygames: Barrett’s Arkham series continues with a video all about Arkham Origins and whether it still holds up. That’s also up right now. And the final episode, all about Arkham Knight, premieres this SUNDAY on Halloween at 2:30pm PT!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:09:20 - A new Pikmin game is here! - Mariella Moon @ Engadget
00:16:30 - Nintendo Switch Online datamine points to upcoming N64 games - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:27:44 - Blizzard Cancels Online BlizzCon 2022 - Mike Fahey @ Kotaku
00:34:40 - Composer Shoji Meguro leaves Atlus - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:31:30 - Ad
00:41:18 - Sackboy: A Big Adventure may be coming to Steam - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:48:09 - November’s PlayStation Plus games have been revealed early - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:49:15 - Apple Music launches on PS5 today - PS Blog
00:52:00 - One more for the road: Superliminal is adding a multiplayer Battle Royale? - Rachel Fiddis @ Dualshockers
00:55:07 - Out today
00:58:00 - Squad Up:Joe(PS5) - Vlad_Filanov
00:59:03 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam and Tim
